title: Plunder
desc:
Post 282
-Select a player and choose between Scimitar slash, Rapier stab, or Flintlock shot
-Your opponent chooses between Sidestep, Chainmail, or Backpedal
-Scimitar beats sidestep, Rapier beats Chainmail, and Flintlock beats Backpedal
-If you win the duel, take their best card
